product_details.name: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker
product_details.description: Item Id: ITM9DCDFCD2431DB. Listing Id: LSTACCG25T3Z4CHBUAPQJ9CJC. Brand: Mivi. Sub Title: Black, Mono Channel. Stock: IN_STOCK. Delivery - delivery by: 26 May, Monday. Delivery - delivery type: FREE Delivery. Variants - ACCG25T43BAHVRZD: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Variants - ACCG25T4GTENPNFN: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Variants - ACCG25T4HNWQJWBB: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Variants - ACCG25TDZ2TXB4WT: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Variants - ACCG25T4KQYGPPDF: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. Variants - ACCG25T3Z4CHBUAP: Mivi Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4 5 W Portable Bluetooth Speaker. highlights: Power Output(RMS): 5 W, Power Source: Battery, Battery life: 12 hr | Charging time: 2 hr, Bluetooth Version: 5, Wireless range: 10 m, Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth. Description: Meet Mivi Play, a portable and powerful Bluetooth speaker made for your personal indoor use. Movie marathons, Personal Concerts or a small get together, the Mivi Play bluetooth speaker is built to let you enjoy your favourite jams in all conditions. It packs a rechargeable lithium-ion battery of up to 12 hours, lasting longer than your party. Add a second speaker with our True Wireless Stereo feature to enter a stereo mode, and enjoy an even louder bass. With Bluetooth 5.0 and an in-built microphone, this speaker comes with the latest and advanced technology for all-round quality performance. This wireless bluetooth speaker will rock your world!. specifications - General - Sales Package: 1 Speaker. specifications - General - Model Number: BS5PL-BK. specifications - General - Model Name: Play 12HRS Playback, Bass Boosted,TWS Feature, IPX4. specifications - General - Type: Mobile/Tablet Speaker. specifications - General - Portable: Yes. specifications - General - Bluetooth: Yes. specifications - General - Memory Card Slot: No. specifications - General - Configuration: Mono. specifications - General - Power Source: Battery. specifications - General - Power Output (RMS): 5 W. specifications - General - Frequency Response: 20Hz to 20Khz. specifications - General - Impedance: 4 Ohms. specifications - General - Color: Black. specifications - General - Wired/Wireless: Wireless. specifications - General - Outdoor Usage: Yes. specifications - Product Details - Configuration: Mono Channel. specifications - Product Details - Compatible Devices: Mobiles, Laptop, Tablet. specifications - Product Details - Charging Time: 2 hr. specifications - Product Details - Battery: Li-Polymer, Use Time 12 hr. specifications - Product Details - Battery Capacity: 1000 mAh. specifications - Product Details - Bluetooth: 5. specifications - Product Details - Bluetooth Range: 10 m. specifications - Audio Features - Amplifier: Yes. specifications - Audio Features - Other Audio Features: HD sound. specifications - Other Details - Driver Size: 2 Inch. specifications - Other Details - Power Input: 5V. specifications - Other Details - Other Features: Battery Life : Mid volume 12 hrs, IPX4 rating, Easy responsive controls change music tracks and control volume, Built-in mic for hands free calling. specifications - Dimensions - Width: 8 cm. specifications - Dimensions - Height: 7 cm. specifications - Dimensions - Depth: 6.8 cm. specifications - Warranty - Warranty Service Type: 1 Year Warranty. For claims please send email to support@mivi.in or call 8099973333. specifications - Warranty - Warranty Summary: 1 year warranty provided by the manufacturer from date of purchase. specifications - Warranty - Domestic Warranty: 1 Year. offers: 5% Unlimited Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card, 10% off up to ₹1,000 on all Axis Bank Credit Card (incl. migrated ones) EMI Txns of ₹7,490 and above, 10% off up to ₹1000 on Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card EMI Txns, on orders of ₹7,490 and above, Get extra 11% off (price inclusive of cashback/coupon), No Cost EMI on Bajaj Finserv EMI Card on cart value above ₹2999, 10% off on BOBCARD Transactions, up to ₹1,250 on orders of ₹7,500 and above, 10% off up to ₹1500 on BOBCARD EMI Transactions on 6 months and above tenure. banner_details:
This vibrant banner presents a bold, modern aesthetic ideal for tech product advertising. The background is split diagonally with a deep navy (#0A1930) and a bright cyan (#00A5CF), accented by minimal white translucent shapes for visual interest. A large, striking heading ("heading_1" and "heading_2") sits at the top in a futuristic, block-style font in white. Below, a cyan-colored subheading ("subheading") introduces the product. Additional features are listed in clean white text ("description"). The bottom area emphasizes value with an exciting tagline ("tagline") in cyan, a bold white price ("price"), and a high-contrast CTA ("cta") inside a cyan box ("cta_background") and navy text. A realistic speaker image ("product_image") is prominently displayed, completing the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A1930  
- Cyan Blue: #00A5CF  
- Neon Cyan: #00EEFF  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF  
- Charcoal Black (Product): #1A1A1A
product_color: The product image features a compact wireless speaker with a sleek matte charcoal black finish that exudes modern minimalism. The primary color is a rich Charcoal Black (#2B2E32), with soft gradients adding depth and smooth blending across the cylindrical body. Metallic Gray (#9DA0A3) is used for the MIVI logo and top grille, making it subtly stand out without overpowering the design. The green LED indicator at the bottom adds a vibrant pop of Neon Green (#A5FF32), providing a tech-forward touch that draws attention. This trio—Charcoal Black, Metallic Gray, and Neon Green—forms a striking yet cohesive palette ideal for advertisement banners.
